claims.claim: Accenture enabled customers to deploy applications with minimal effort through scalable infrastructure
claims.quote: Learn how Accenture built a scalable system for Blueriq on AWS that enables customers in regulated sectors to securely deploy applications with minimal effort.

claims.claim: The platform solution allows customers to avoid on-premises hardware costs
claims.quote: He wanted to make the Blueriq Platform available as a PaaS solution so customers could deploy new Blueriq-based applications in the cloud without running into scaling limitations or incurring on-premises hardware costs.

claims.claim: The solution helps customers speed up time to identify processes for automation and deploy applications
